description: Backend engineer in a financial institution, contributing to scalable infrastructure and service development. Focused on Node.js services deployed on GCP with strong DevOps practices.
Part of a distributed team building backend services and cloud infrastructure. Worked closely on microservices architecture for mobile and web applications.
Worked as a consultant building software solutions for international clients. Delivered production-grade code and contributed to team practices and architecture decisions.
Launched and maintained a local transportation solution using web technologies. Focused on MVP development and deployment while managing technical decisions.
Worked on Adidas.com ecommerce platform. Focused on frontend development with JavaScript/TypeScript and backend services with Node.js. Advocated for functional programming practices.
Developed mobile and web applications for Univision platforms, including news and sports apps. Collaborated on cross-platform development and integration.
Built mobile apps in iOS and Android using React Native, Java, and Objective-C for insurance clients.
Worked on frontend projects for clients like Hallmark and Lending Club using EmberJS, ReactJS, and NodeJS.
Contributed to NFL mobile/web application development using React Native and modern frontend tools.
Designed and developed delivery and client mobile apps. Maintained real-time systems using NodeJS and Django.
Worked on automation and embedded systems integrating hardware with software components in parking solutions.
